- NEW! Intuitive user interface - with enhanced workflow for browsing , editing and organising your photos.
- NEW! Organise your photos - create on-screen albums using Photo ExplosionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy-to-use tools. Add keywords, tags and ratings to help search for photos fast - you can even browse by source and date taken.
